name: screenmix
description: A desktop app for taking screenshots and capturing screen

scripts.build: npx concurrently "cd renderer && npm run build" "cd main && npm run build"
scripts.watch: npx concurrently "cd renderer && npm run watch" "cd main && npm run watch"
scripts.package-exe: rm -rf ./release/* && npm run build && cd main && npm run make && mv ./out ../release/
scripts.release: rm -rf release && npm run package-exe && npm run package-appx && mkdir release && mv main/appx main/out release/
